TopicTitle: Looking for a mod that adds more radial intakes for aircraft? Ex. Su-27 intake/engine mount?

Articles.Content:
Hey guys. I'm looking to make my aircraft look more realistic, and i'm looking for mods that add things like pitot tubes and other accessories, along with more intakes and engine mounts.

Any ideas?
None specifically for that, but QuizTech Aero has cockpits with integraded intakes that look like fighter intakes

Tweakscale The stock Structural Intake at 200% size will look totally Su-27.

On a more serious note, Mk2 Stockalike Expansion, MK2 Stockalike Expansion, MK3 stockalike expansion and SXT add quite a few aero parts including intakes.

I think Lack's stock estionsion has a SU-27 cockpit.

The WW2 armory mod has a few antenna.

If someone could take the nose pointy bit of the SAS abilities cone thing (The one that used to be for science) and turn it into a few instruments, I would love you forever.

On 11/3/2016 at 6:01 AM, Rath said:

I think Lack's stock estionsion has a SU-27 cockpit.

The WW2 armory mod has a few antenna.

If someone could take the nose pointy bit of the SAS abilities cone thing (The one that used to be for science) and turn it into a few instruments, I would love you forever.

 

Can confirm, Lack's Stock extension does indeed have an SU-27 adapter for a mk1 sized cockpit
